Interface Norm<O,D extends Distance<D>>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    D - Distance type
    All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DoubleNorm<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface Norm<O,D extends Distance<D>>
extends DistanceFunction<O,D>
    Abstract interface for a mathematical norm.
